医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
REDH 数据库提供了对造血细胞 RNA 编辑的见解通过 RNA 将 DNA 转化为蛋白质的过程远非简单。在参与蛋白质合成过程的几种类型的 RNA 中，有一些可能会在中途被编辑。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230710/REDH-database-provides-insights-into-RNA-editing-in-hematopoietic-cells.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230710/REDH-database-provides-insights-into-RNA-editing-in-hematopoietic-cells.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=cfbc05c3-ac8c-4f92-90b0-b331438a6821 Mon, 10 Jul 2023 15:01:37 -0400 REDH database provides insights into RNA editing in hematopoietic cells
硫代磷酸酯骨架修饰增强了胰腺癌治疗的适体-药物缀合物胰腺癌是一种复杂且致命的实体瘤，给诊断和治疗带来了重大挑战。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230710/Phosphorothioate-backbone-modification-enhances-aptamer-drug-conjugate-for-pancreatic-cancer-therapy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230710/Phosphorothioate-backbone-modification-enhances-aptamer-drug-conjugate-for-pancreatic-cancer-therapy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=62eef076-e78d-4708-8962-dcca7420d531 Mon, 10 Jul 2023 14:59:38 -0400 Phosphorothioate backbone modification enhances aptamer-drug conjugate for pancreatic cancer therapy
AMP 发布 CYP3A4 和 CYP3A5 基因分型检测的共识建议全球首要的分子诊断专业协会分子病理学协会 (AMP) 今天发布了共识建议，以帮助设计和验证临床 CYP3A4 和 CYP3A5 基因分型测定，促进不同实验室测试的标准化，并改善患者护理。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230710/AMP-releases-consensus-recommendations-for-CYP3A4-and-CYP3A5-genotyping-assays.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230710/AMP-releases-consensus-recommendations-for-CYP3A4-and-CYP3A5-genotyping-assays.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8e9abea1-d9df-4347-830d-e2a214715646 Mon, 10 Jul 2023 14:57:30 -0400 AMP releases consensus recommendations for CYP3A4 and CYP3A5 genotyping assays
高肿瘤单核细胞含量与食管癌患者更好的预后相关路德维希癌症研究中心的一项研究发现，肿瘤中存在相对较多的称为单核细胞的免疫细胞，与接受化疗和免疫疗法或免疫化疗联合治疗的食道癌患者的更好结果有关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230710/High-tumor-monogenic-content-linked-to-better-outcomes-for-esophageal-cancer-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230710/High-tumor-monogenic-content-linked-to-better-outcomes-for-esophageal-cancer-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fe244438-9a7c-4585-86eb-eba3e968b5ff Mon, 10 Jul 2023 14:55:47 -0400 High tumor monocyte content linked to better outcomes for esophageal cancer patients
科学家研究一种具有大流行潜力的蝙蝠病毒当原产于一种蝙蝠的 SARS-CoV-2 病毒发生突变并感染人类时，发生了毁灭性的 COVID-19 大流行。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230710/Scientists-investigate-a-bat-virus-with-pandemic-pottial.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230710/Scientists-investigate-a-bat-virus-with-pandemic-pottial.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=600867df-81d6-4222-8a50-748bae4d56b7 Mon, 10 Jul 2023 14:52:26 -0400 Scientists investigate a bat virus with pandemic potential
基于棒棒糖的唾液收集系统有望实现更愉快、更准确的诊断测试对于一个忍受了去医生办公室的孩子来说，棒棒糖可能是一个甜蜜的奖励，但现在，这种糖果可以使就诊期间的诊断测试变得更少侵入性和更愉快。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230710/Lollipop-based-saliva-collection-system-shows-promise-for-more-enjoyable-accurate-diagnostic-testing.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230710/Lollipop-based-saliva-collection-system-shows-promise-for-more-enjoyable-accurate-diagnostic-testing.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=01332494-fab8-4dd7-8ce0-c66615f2336e Mon, 10 Jul 2023 14:25:11 -0400 Lollipop-based saliva collection system shows promise for more enjoyable, accurate diagnostic testing
流感大流行期间，因酒精相关的肝炎住院人数急剧增加一项对全国住院数据的研究显示，大流行期间酒精销售的繁荣似乎给一些人带来了可怕的后果，因为与酒精相关的肝炎（一种危及生命的肝脏炎症）入院人数急剧增加。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230710/Alcohol-lated-hepatitis-hospitalizations-increased-dramatically-during-the-pandemic.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230710/Alcohol-lated-hepatitis-hospitalizations-increased-dramatically-during-the-pandemic.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b7b0576e-8349-4a09-87ea-f8c2170f4a91 Mon, 10 Jul 2023 14:22:46 -0400 Alcohol-related hepatitis hospitalizations increased dramatically during the pandemic
大脑中的生物标志物可以重新定义心理健康状况由尖端机器学习技术驱动的大脑生物标志物研究可以重新定义心理健康状况的分类和诊断方式，并带来更有效、个性化的治疗。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230710/Biomarkers-in-the-brain-could-redefine-mental-health-conditions.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230710/Biomarkers-in-the-brain-could-redefine-mental-health-conditions.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=86f90274-1b48-43b4-9c1c-2343e7253910 Mon, 10 Jul 2023 14:21:34 -0400 Biomarkers in the brain could redefine mental health conditions
研究表明同性性行为可能是灵长类动物繁殖的共同特征对野生猕猴群三年多的观察表明，雄性猕猴中的同性性行为很普遍，而且可能是有益的。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230710/Same-sex- Sex-behavior-may-be-a-common-feature-of-primate-reproductive-study-suggests.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230710/Same-sex- Sex-behavior-may-be-a-common-feature-of-primate-reproductive-study-suggests.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a81686fa-4d22-4a4b-9b5a-ff02bcbd992b Mon, 10 Jul 2023 14:20:24 -0400 Same-sex sexual behavior may be a common feature of primate reproduction, study suggests
研究：口味限制可以在对抗青少年电子烟流行方面取得重大进展俄亥俄州立大学综合癌症中心烟草研究中心的一项新研究表明，完全限制烟弹和一次性电子烟设备中的甜味剂和清凉剂，可以在对抗青少年电子烟流行方面取得重大进展。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230710/Study-Flavor-restrictions-could-make-major-progress-in-fighting-youth-vaping-epidemic.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230710/Study-Flavor-restrictions-could-make-major-progress-in-fighting-youth-vaping-epidemic.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=562c6279-6694-496c-b53f-249ca2ff638c Mon, 10 Jul 2023 14:17:45 -0400 Study: Flavor restrictions could make major progress in fighting youth vaping epidemic
